segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading fast, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she doesn’t notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, it’s like she’s in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn’t slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are up to no good, but she hasn’t even turned around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t heard the water running all this time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should say something, but I don’t want to startle her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and she’s just standing there polishing dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
